channel.title: Htc on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in Htc on David Collantes

item.title: The Hero
item.description: I am in love with the HTC Hero. I do not have one… yet, still, when thinking on a mobile device I would love to have, the Hero is what comes to mind. And what better song to keep my hopes alive than “Holding out for a Hero”, by Bonnie Tyler? So, here it goes! Edited: Song removed. Did not wanted to get sued for hosting a sound track which copyright might forbid wide audience availability.
